< Back About Me

These days I develop for iOS. Frequently seen hiking, snowboarding, running, climbing. I love traveling, learning and teaching. In a previous life I cooked for a living, and before that I cooked to eat awesome food. I've appreciated tons of music and love playing it.

Some of my favorite games involve words:

  • Scrabble
  • crosswords
  • Bananagrams
  • Scattergories
  • Cards Against Humanity

  • Christopher Nolan

Top five live musicians:
